downloadTitle: Microsoft Application Request Routing Version 3 beta for IIS 8
downloadDescription: Microsoft Application Request Routing (ARR) for IIS8 is a proxy based routing module that forwards HTTP requests to application servers based on HTTP headers and server variables, and load balance algorithms.   ARR Version 3 adds support for WebSockets.
detailsSection:
Microsoft Application Request Routing (ARR) for IIS 8 is a proxy-based routing module that forwards HTTP requests to application servers based on HTTP headers, server variables, and load balance algorithms.

ARR Version 3 is an incremental release that includes all of the features from Version 2, and adds support for WebSockets. 
<br /><br />ARR Version 3 includes the following key features:

<UL>
<LI>WebSocket Support : ARRv3 supports proxying and load balancing of Websocket connections.

<LI>Retries for URL health check : It supports multiple retries of URL health check before marking server unhealthy.</LI>

The ARR version 2 and ARR version 3 cannot be installed side-by-side.

More details can be found on www.iis.net
systemRequirementsSection:
• Internet Information Services 8.0 must be installed
  • WebSockets module must be enabled
installInstructionSection:
Please follow How to install ARR without WebPI blog (http://blogs.iis.net/wonyoo/archive/2011/04/20/how-to-install-application-request-routing-arr-2-5-without-web-platform-installer-webpi.aspx) for installation instructions.
Once ARR2.5 is installed, download and install ARRv3.0 beta to upgrade from ARRv2.5 to ARRv3.
